function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Accelerated adoption of digital solutions in traditional retailing","Impact":"Survival of brick-and-mortar retailers during the pandemic","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective digital solutions and adaptation to new consumer behaviors","Technologies":"E-commerce platforms, contactless payment systems, virtual reality shopping experiences","People":"Brick-and-mortar retailers, offline retail workers","Owner":"Retailers, business owners, technology companies"},{"Description":"Neutralization of physical retailers' characteristic strengths due to pandemic measures","Impact":"Significant decrease in foot traffic and in-store interactions, reduction in sales and revenue","Mitigation":"Development of alternative in-store experiences, enhancement of online engagement and virtual product testing","Technologies":"Virtual reality technology, augmented reality apps, interactive online interfaces","People":"Physical retailers, in-store sales associates, customers","Owner":"Retailers, marketing and technology teams"}]}
